summary: This is just a simple mod that removes the need to charge Miraak\'s weapons from the dlc Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a simple mod that removes the need to charge Miraak\'s weapons from the dlc Dragonborn.

NMM Installation:
Use Download with Manager button 

Manual Installation:
Open the .rar file and drop the Data folder into your Skyrim directory, then open the Skyrim launcher and open up \"Data Files\". Make sure that Miraak\'s Weapons Unlimited Charge.esp is checked.
author: TwixMan
